data.question: What is the yield percentage of the guest-embedded network 1•3?
What method was used to confirm the enclathration of 4a–c in the pores?
What was the yield of Diels–Alder adduct 5a after heating the inclusion complex 1•3•4a under reflux in cyclohexane?
How was the Diels–Alder reactivity enhanced within the network?
data.answer: By a reduction in the entropy cost by the preorganization of the substrates at suitable positions via molecular recognition.
